name: Trotauniversos y Astroaventuras - The XYAB Squad (LocJam RPG 2021)
name_original: Trotauniversos y Astroaventuras - The XYAB Squad (LocJam RPG 2021)
description:
Hey-ya, pirates, space explorers and mighty knights!

This is our LocJam RPG 2021 entry. It's our first RPG translation for a jam, we're really excited! We've had lots of fun working on it and we hope that you'll have just as much reading it. We also focused on providing an inclusive game which everybody can enjoy, that's why we decided to use gender-neutral language. 

Enjoy the game, and any feedback is welcome!
